title: Skin wont appear
body: I tried to purchase heart seeker lucian but when i go in the shop its not there and it says i dont have it unlocked so idk whats going on

replies.body: Alas, per the[ Heartseeker sale](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/welcome-heartseeker-game-show) announcement, Lucian's skin was only available until 2/15/2017.   It is a legacy skin so it can come back through events, hextech crafting, and mystery gifts.  Let me know if that clears things up!
